title: Ep. 607 People Are Gonna Die!
description:
The Constitution won in Congress yesterday yet Democrats declared now “we’re all going to shoot each other.”
http://click.heritage.org/R00e5TWHIs0030Q0MNTBmr0
 
The media set a dangerous new standard for itself yesterday, this piece highlights their problem.
http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/newsrooms-better-be-prepared-now-that-theyre-labeling-roy-moore-an-accused-child-molester/article/2642735
 
A loony California professor doesn’t want to debate Ben Shapiro but he does want to fight him MMA style.
http://www.dailywire.com/news/24408/california-professor-wont-debate-shapiro-wants-hank-berrien
 
Why is the standard Democrat response to every GOP policy proposal “people are gonna die!”
https://www.wsj.com/articles/people-will-die-1512583154



 
Here’s an interesting piece about the potential conflict with crypto-currencies.
https://mises.org/blog/next-generation-currency-wars-private-vs-state-backed-crypto
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
